0.Major_Activities1: since we form our society we are working in the area of education, social activities , health issues , helping poor and orphan . We started free coaching for student in winter. Organising educational seminar important day like World aids day world day for person with disability, sports day, youth day etc . Now we are conducting workshop on govt scheme and programs on at district level and block level. Our main focus is  on education and women empowerment.
